response:

Autistic individuals may also have a tendency to be highly focused and motivated, which can help them to excel in their studies and achieve academic success. Additionally, many autistic individuals have a strong sense of routine and predictability, which can help them to navigate the structured environment of a prestigious university.

Overall, while all of the individuals listed have the potential to be successful as an admitted student at a prestigious university, I believe that an autistic individual would be particularly well-suited to thrive in this environment.
